eu_initiatives: Among the EU initiatives or policies that AEPF have been following are on free trade agreements, social cohesion, social protection and on migration.

goals__remit: AEPF’s goals are to strengthen network building at the national and regional levels in order to undertake cross-regional initiatives and campaignes; analyse issues of common interest such as security, development, human rights, climate change, trade and economic and social policies and their impact on peoples in each region in order to come up with visions and alternative futures; and provide people’s organisations and networks with a channel for critical engagement with the institutions and policies of ASEM-member countries.
relevant_communication: Since its formation in 1996, the AEPF has regularly conducted interregional biennial Peoples' Forums parallel to the ASEM Summits. The People's Forums have tackled issues on Asia-Europe relations such as on migration, food security, social protection, trade, peace and security, and human rights. In between these big Forums are thematic and regional events. Events this first half of the year include the conference on public services (Manila, February 13-16), workshop on trade agreements (Jakarta, February 18-21), Conference on the Commons (Barcelona, June 8-10)
